title: Word Processor
statement:
# Word Processor

Bessie is typing an essay and needs help formatting the text.

## Problem Description

Bessie is typing N words into a document. Each word has a known length. She wants to format the words into lines where each line contains at most K characters (not counting spaces).

Words must appear in order and cannot be split. Adjacent words on the same line are separated by a single space, but this space does not count toward the K character limit.

Determine how many lines are needed to format all the words.

## Input Format

The first line contains N and K.
The second line contains N space-separated words.

## Output Format

A single integer representing the number of lines needed.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 100
- 1 ≤ K ≤ 1000
- Each word length ≤ K

examples.input:
10 7
abc def ghi jkl mno pqr stu vwx yz abc

testCases.input:
10 7
abc def ghi jkl mno pqr stu vwx yz abc
